meta.description: Nine-question evaluation set for refreshed subject focus (May 2025).
meta.notes: Three items per tier; aligned with refreshed sustainability, technology governance, and advanced systems subjects.

items.subject: Renewable Energy Systems
items.question: Which technology converts sunlight directly into electricity using photovoltaic cells?

items.subject: Modern Spaceflight
items.question: Which company manufactures the Crew Dragon spacecraft that ferries NASA astronauts to the ISS?

items.subject: Digital Privacy Regulation
items.question: Which regulation has governed general data protection in the European Union since 2018?

items.subject: Climate Policy
items.question: What temperature limit does the Paris Agreement urge countries to pursue relative to pre-industrial levels?

items.subject: Quantum Computing
items.question: Which quantum property allows a qubit to occupy multiple classical states simultaneously?

items.subject: Marine Conservation Governance
items.question: Which authority manages the Great Barrier Reef Marine Park on behalf of Australia?
items.correct_answer: Great Barrier Reef Marine Park Authority

distractors.hard: Department of Climate Change, Energy, the Environment and Water

items.subject: Battery Chemistry
items.question: In NMC811 lithium-ion cells, which transition metal makes up 80% of the cathode mix?

items.subject: Earth Observation Missions
items.question: Which satellite mission launched in 2020 continues the Jason sea-level altimetry record for ESA and NASA?

items.subject: Web Authentication Standards
items.question: Which W3C standard defines the browser API used for passwordless public-key sign-ins known as passkeys?
